ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Imbrued gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: by the way, for those interested in tests, the bard in our guild (also the guild leader) with the belt of concordance (only 2 on our server) comfirms it is the
ygData.messageBody:
by the way, for those interested in tests, the bard in our guild (also the
guild leader) with the belt of concordance (only 2 on our server) comfirms
it is the same as FBSS speed. too bad as i was expecting dragon-like haste
(30-35%) instead of fbss (15%). not that i wouldn't take one, it has great
stats. i haven't even been to sky yet, since when we go it's usually for
several days due to cost and i don't have that kind of time to put in. i am
content to wait til i have gained a few levels before i go up.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L45 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: "JasonF" <jasonf@...>
>
> I have a FBSS
> and am quite happy until I get my Belt of Concordance.
>
> [48 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
>
